summary: A man decides to cook for himself, but finds the revolver of John Dillinger hidden in his kitchen instead.
cast: Michel Piccoli|Anita Pallenberg|Gino Lavagetto|Mario Jannilli|Carole André|Annie Girardot|Adriano Aprà|Carla Petrillo
keywords: gun|murder|female nudity|cooking|murder of a nude woman
title: Dillinger ha muerto
